name: type: 🐛 fix
description: Fix an bug/error which doesn't affect the functionality.

name: type: 🐞 hot-fix
description: Urgent production fix for an bug/error which doesn't affect the functionality.

name: type: ✨ feature
description: Add/update a functional or technical feature.

name: type: 🛠  rework
description: Fix an bug/error which resulted in functional errors.

name: type: 🏎  performance
description: Changes to the code which improve the performance without functional  changes.

name: type: ⚡ major
description: Code is an breaking change if it changes the API interface

name: status: 🆕  new
description: issue is new but not refined or ready to work on.

name: status: 🐐 refined
description: Issue is refined and ready to work on.

name: status: 👷 in progress
description: Issue is being worked on. branch created and if possible a draft PR

name: status: 🚦 on-hold
description: Issue has been put on hold due to other priorities.

name: status: 🕵  ready
description: issue is ready for review, PR is set to ready

name: status: ❌  wontfix
description: Issue won't be fixed or implemented and closed

name: status: ♻ duplicate
description: issue is a duplicate and closed

name: status: 🚧  blocked
description: Issue needs to be worked on but blocked
